Package org.sakaiproject.jsf.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationResource
    Thin wrapper for lookup of configuration of resources.
    ConversionUtil
    Provides methods helpful in making object conversions not provided for by the Sun or MyFaces distributions.
    HelperAwareJsfTool
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    JSFDepends
    This source file collects the dependencies of the Sakai tag library on the JSF implementation into one place.
    JSFDepends.ButtonRenderer  
    JSFDepends.ColumnTag  
    JSFDepends.CommandButtonTag
    Sun JSF RI dependent classes
    JSFDepends.CommandLinkRenderer  
    JSFDepends.DataTableTag  
    JSFDepends.InputTextTag  
    JSFDepends.MessagesTag  
    JSFDepends.OutputTextTag  
    JSFDepends.PanelGridTag  
    JsfTool
    Sakai Servlet to use for all JSF tools.
    LocaleUtil
    Instead of using standard methods of deciding which locale should be used when loading a resource, Sakai tools are requested to go through the Sakai-specific ResourceLoader class, which lets Sakai-specific settings such as site preferences be taken into account.
    RendererUtil
    Common static utility methods that help in implementing JSF tags.
    SamigoJsfTool
    Customized JsfTool for Samigo - just to workaround the fact that Samigo has the JSF URL mapping "*.faces" hard-coded in several places.
    TagUtil
    Common static utility methods that help in implementing JSF tags.
